newsitem.title: USA: Eftek declares 1-for-3 reverse stk split.
newsitem.headline: Eftek declares 1-for-3 reverse stk split.

text.p: Eftek Corp said Tuesday that it has declared a one-for-three reverse split of its common stock.
The company said that any fractional shares will be rounded up to the next whole share.
The new stock certificates, said Eftek, will be issued in the normal course of business whenever the appropriate transfer is requested by a shareholder.
The company added that the number of authorized shares, the par value, and the 65,412 Class A Warrants and 81,059 Class B Warrants would remain unchanged.
